standup.standup_channel_set: Standup channel has been set to {channel.mention}
standup.standup_description: This is the newly generated text channel used for daily standups!

standup_fields.Introduction: Hi! I'm {bot.user.name} and I will be facilitating your daily standups from now on. To view all available commands, try `!help`

standup.member_added: You are now participating in standup
standup_questions: What are your goals for today?
Is there anything stopping you from completing your tasks?
standup.questions_message_fmt:
Here is your daily standup prompt:
```
{questions}```
Please make sure you have thought about your response **very carefully** as standups are more for *the entire team*.
Once you are ready to respond, simply DM me with `!reply ...` where `...` represents your response.
standup.cant_reply: You can't send a reply at this time
standup.not_in_standup: You are not participating in the standup right now
standup.already_replied: You have already replied to the questions
standup.no_longer_a_member: You're no longer participating in standup
standup.reset_message: All standup data has been reset
standup.no_reply: You haven't sent a reply yet
